category-def.name: org.palladiosimulator.corefeatures.category
category-def.label: Palladio Bench Core Features
category-def.description: This category contains all features which belong to a complete installation of the Palladio Bench Core Features

category-def.name: org.palladiosimulator.support.category
category-def.label: Palladio Supporting Features
category-def.description: Features that support the Palladio Bench tooling, but also could be used independently

category-def.name: org.palladiosimulator.support.source.category
category-def.label: Palladio Supporting Features Source
category-def.description: Source code of the features that support the Palladio Bench tooling, but also could be used independently

category-def.name: org.palladiosimulator.qual.category
category-def.label: Quality Analysis Lab
category-def.description: The Quality Analysis Lab (QuAL) is responsible for taking measurements from experiments or simulations and their persistance

category-def.name: org.palladiosimulator.qual.source.category
category-def.label: Quality Analysis Lab Source
category-def.description: Sources of the Quality Analysis Lab (QuAL)
